summary: Backend testing for Seller Analytics Settings feature - all 12 tests passed. Endpoints tested: GET/POST /admin/settings/seller-analytics, GET/POST /admin/settings/engagement-notifications, GET /admin/analytics/platform, GET /admin/analytics/sellers, GET /admin/analytics/engagement
critical_code_review_comments: All admin analytics/settings endpoints are properly implemented in server.py (lines 7894-8160)
Endpoints correctly require authentication (returns 401 without valid Bearer token)
Settings persistence works correctly - POST saves to admin_settings collection, GET retrieves
Frontend fetchSettings() function correctly fetches settings when Settings tab is activated
context_for_next_testing_agent: All seller analytics settings backend endpoints are working correctly. Tests verify GET/POST for seller-analytics settings (alert_threshold, low_performance_threshold) and engagement-notifications settings (milestones and triggers). Round-trip persistence tests confirm data is correctly saved and retrieved.

returns.milestones: object with firstSale, tenListings, hundredMessages, badgeMilestone
returns.triggers: object with inactiveSeller, lowEngagement, challengeReminder, weeklyDigest

GET_platform_analytics.returns: total_users, new_users_today, new_users_week, active_users, total_listings, active_listings, total_transactions, total_revenue, categories

GET_engagement_analytics.returns: total_messages, messages_today, total_favorites, badge_awards_count, challenge_completions, notification_read_rate

authentication.description: All endpoints correctly return 401 when accessed without valid Bearer token
